Name: VariablesInRecord
Description: Use VariablesInRecord to describe any variables in the record that are external to the NCube such as case identifiers.

Name: NCubeSchemeReference
Description: Reference to an NCubeScheme whose members are included in the logical record. Note that individual items may be excluded from the scheme if not used by the logical record.

Name: NCubeReference
Description: Reference to an NCube to include in the logical record. This may be used to supplement the contents of an included NCubeScheme or to list all the variables individually.

Name: AllNCubesInLogicalProduct
Description: When the value is true, then the logical record contains all listed NCubes in the logical product module.
